\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{consumer:consumer.Consumer}}\pysigline{\sphinxstrong{class }\sphinxcode{consumer.}\sphinxbfcode{Consumer}}
This is the class from which the program is controlled. It can be used together with the {\hyperref[\detokenize{handler:module-handler}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{handler}}}} module in order to communicate with an external client over a websocket
\begin{quote}\begin{description}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{SOURCES} (\href{https://docs.python.org/2/library/functions.html\#list}{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{(}\href{https://docs.python.org/2/library/functions.html\#str}{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{)}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{}) -- All of the sources referenced to in the edges of the concept map

\item {}

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\index{Edge (class in edge)}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{edge:edge.Edge}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxstrong{class }\sphinxcode{edge.}\sphinxbfcode{Edge}}{\emph{*args}, \emph{**values}}{}
A class representing an edge from a concept map
:param from\_node: The parent node of the edge
:type from\_node: Node
:param to\_node: The child node of the edge
:type to\_node: Node
:param label: A label describing the relation between from\_node and to\_node
:type label: StringField
:param source: The source where this edge is described (e.g. paragraph 13.2 from Laagland)
:type source: StringField

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{Flashcard (class in flashcard)}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{flashcard:flashcard.Flashcard}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxstrong{class }\sphinxcode{flashcard.}\sphinxbfcode{Flashcard}}{\emph{*args}, \emph{**values}}{}
A class representing a flashcard
:param question: The question on the front side of the flashcard
:type question: StringField
:param answer: The answer on the back side of the flashcard
:type answer: StringField
:param sources: The sources where this flashcard are described (e.g. paragraph 13.2 of Laagland)
:type sources: ListField(StringField)
:param response\_model: A list consisting of parts of valid responses to the question (for the test matrix)
:type response\_model: ListField(StringField)

\end{fulllineitems}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{handler:handler.handler}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{handler.}\sphinxbfcode{handler}}{\emph{websocket}, \emph{path}}{}
Initiate an asyncio thread which receives messages from a client, parse the json file to an object, pass them to consumer() and send the result back to the client
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{websocket} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{Websocket}) -- the websocket being used for receiving and sending messages to a client

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{path} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{String}) -- the IP address used to host the websocket

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{test\_item\_responses} ({\hyperref[\detokenize{test_item_response:test_item_response.TestItemResponse}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{TestItemResponse}}}}) -- A list of responses to the item questions on the test

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}
\index{generate\_test() (test.Test method)}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{test:test.Test.generate_test}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{generate\_test}}{\emph{items}, \emph{prev\_items}}{}
A method for taking five random items in a random order from the provided list of items without the items in the previous items
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{items} (\href{https://docs.python.org/2/library/functions.html\#list}{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{(}{\hyperref[\detokenize{flashcard:flashcard.Flashcard}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{Flashcard}}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{) or }\href{https://docs.python.org/2/library/functions.html\#list}{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{(}{\hyperref[\detokenize{test_item:test_item.TestItem}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{TestItem}}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{)}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{}) -- The complete list of items

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{prev\_items} (\href{https://docs.python.org/2/library/functions.html\#list}{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{(}{\hyperref[\detokenize{flashcard:flashcard.Flashcard}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{Flashcard}}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{) or }\href{https://docs.python.org/2/library/functions.html\#list}{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{(}{\hyperref[\detokenize{test_item:test_item.TestItem}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{TestItem}}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{)}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{}) -- The list of items to be excluded from the result

\end{itemize}

\item[{Result}] \leavevmode
A sample of five items from items not included in prev\_items

\item[{Return type}] \leavevmode
\href{https://docs.python.org/2/library/functions.html\#list}{list}(FlashcardResponse) or \href{https://docs.python.org/2/library/functions.html\#list}{list}({\hyperref[\detokenize{test_item_response:test_item_response.TestItemResponse}]{\sphinxcrossref{TestItemResponse}}})

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}


\end{fulllineitems}
